resources.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS champion ( champion_code INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, champion_name VARCHAR(100), lane_strength FLOAT(5,2), team_fight FLOAT(5,2), split_push FLOAT(5,2), one_vs_one_strength FLOAT(5,2), initiating FLOAT(5,2), poking FLOAT(5,2), type INTEGER(2), to_six_potential FLOAT(5,2), to_elv_potential FLOAT(5,2), to_sixteen_potential FLOAT(5,2) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS player ( player_code INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, season_code INTEGER, player_name VARCHAR(50), position INTEGER(2), physical FLOAT(5,2), team_fight FLOAT(5,2), out_smart FLOAT(5,2), lane_strength FLOAT(5,2), stability FLOAT(5,2), fame_lv INTEGER(3) )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS player_champion_played_data ( player_code INTEGER, champion_code INTEGER, win INTEGER(3), lose INTEGER(3), kda FLOAT(4,1) )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sub_roster ( subRoster_Code INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, player_code INTEGER, main_order INTEGER(2) )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS team ( team_code INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, user_code INTEGER, user_type INTEGER(2), team_name VARCHAR(100), main_roster_code INTEGER, sub_roster_code INTEGER )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user ( user_code INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, user_id VARCHAR(200), user_phone_num VARCHAR(500), user_nick_name VARCHAR(150), user_fame_lv INTEGER(3), user_money INTEGER, season_code INTEGER(2), match_num INTEGER(4), api_ver INTEGER(3) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_record ( user_record_code INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, user_code INTEGER, season_code INTEGER, rank VARCHAR(150), win INTEGER(3), lose INTEGER(3), win_diff INTEGER(3), fame_diff INTEGER(3), top_player_code INTEGER, jungle_player_code INTEGER, mid_player_code INTEGER, ad_player_code INTEGER, support_player_code INTEGER )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS champion_counter ( champion_code INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, counter_champion_code INTEGER, lane_win_rate FLOAT(4,1) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS league_schedule ( league_schedule_code INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, match_num INTEGER(4), team_code_a INTEGER, team_code_b INTEGER, score_a INTEGER(2), score_b INTEGER(2), play_flag INTEGER )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS main_roster ( main_roster_code INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, player_code INTEGER, main_order INTEGER(2) )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS match_data ( match_data_code INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, league_schedule_code INTEGER, team_code INTEGER, player_code INTEGER, champion_code INTEGER )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS league_rank ( rank INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, team_code INTEGER, win INTEGER, lose INTEGER, wd INTEGER )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pog_point ( rank INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, player_code INTEGER, pog_point INTEGER )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS transfer_window ( transfer_window_code INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, weeks INTEGER, player_code INTEGER, transfer_fee INTEGER, salary_wants INTEGER, salary_offer INTEGER, min_salary INTEGER )
